DOC.criteria: 1. selfidentification African American 2. current smoker ≥ 5 cigarettes/day expire CO level ≥ 8 ppm ; 3. age 1865 ; 4. able speak read English ; 5. permanent contact information ; 6. access transportation public transit car ; 7. current behavioral pharmacological treatment ; 8. interest quit smoking ; ( 9 ) availability attend session . 1. enrol another cessation program , 2. speak read English , 3. access transportation car bus attend session , 4. childcare session time , 5. contraindication patch use ( pregnant/breastfeeding ) , 6. treatment substance abuse ( e.g. , illicit drug , alcohol abuse ) , 7. endorse active addiction another substance ( e.g. , illicit drug alcohol ) , 8. diagnose acute cardiac respiratory condition ; 9. people identify severe mental illness
